channel.title: Press on Save Marsden Point
channel.description: Recent content in Press on Save Marsden Point

item.title: In The Press
item.description: Refinery/ Jun 2021 - Marsden Point closure could expose NZ to fuel security risks The Energy Minister said these risks are not significant, but a consultant’s report to the government says the opposite. Aug 2021 - Marsden Point refinery closure threatens energy security, Maritime Union says Security and resilience were now the two most important factors for the economy. The closure of the refinery was corporate self-interest and not in the wider interests of New Zealand.
